instructions: Open the email in the Mail app. Tap the Flag icon. Select Flag . Other options are Mark as Unread, Move to Junk, and Notify Me, which notifies you when someone replies to an email thread. A flagged email displays an orange dot next to it in the Inbox as well as in the message. To find flagged email messages, go to the Mail Home screen and open the Flagged folder.

Open the folder that contains the messages whose flags you want to edit. Tap Edit . Tap Mark All to mark every email in the folder. To mark some emails, tap the circle next to each email to fill it with a check mark. Tap Mark . Select Flag to add flags to the selected messages. If the messages are flagged, tap Unflag to remove the flags.

Image titled Contact Roku Step 1 1 Visit the Roku support page for customer service help. You can find the Roku customer support page at https://support.roku.com/contactus . Select an issue from the drop-down search bar and read the article that the help page leads you to to see if it can help you fix your issue. [1] Image titled Contact Roku Step 2 2 Click on Contact Support if you still need help. If the articles about your topic didn t help and you d still like to talk to a Roku representative, click on Contact Support to talk to an agent. [2] This will take you to a page with three options of either online chatting, sending an email, or calling the Roku support people. Image titled Contact Roku Step 3 3 Start an online chat for immediate help. To start the chat, click on Live text chat and type in your name, email, and phone number, along with the message you d like to send to Roku customer support. Click Start Chatting once your message is ready to be sent. [3] You can use the chat feature any time throughout the year. Image titled Contact Roku Step 4 4 Click on the email option for a less-urgent problem or question. Click on Email to begin filling out your contact information. Type in your name, email address, and phone number before filling in your question or description of the problem. Once you re finished, click Continue to finish the emailing process. [4] Image titled Contact Roku Step 5 5 Call Roku's customer service department for personalized help. The support number is 816-272-8106. While specific call times aren't listed, calling anytime during the day will likely enable you to speak with a representative. [5] Be aware that you may be put on hold if you're calling during a particularly busy time. Advertisement

Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 1 1 Open on your iPhone or iPad. It s the multi-colored flower icon on your home screen. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 2 2 Select a photo to edit. You can browse the All Photos folder to see every photo on your phone, or scroll down to My Albums to browse by album. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 3 3 Tap the Edit icon. It s the third icon (the one with three horizontal lines with circles) at the bottom of your photo. [1] Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 4 4 Tap the Filters icon. It s the icon with three overlapping circles at the bottom of the photo. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 5 5 Select a filter. The filters appear beneath the photo. Swipe across the filter list to view additional options, and then tap a filter to see a preview. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 6 6 Tap . This saves your photo with the filter applied. If you decide you don t like the filter, tap Revert at the bottom right side of the photo. The original photo will be restored. Advertisement

Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 7 1 Open your iPhone s . It s the gray camera icon on your home screen. Make sure either Photo or Square is selected at the bottom of the screen. Filters are not available for Time-Lapse, Video, or Pano mode. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 8 2 Tap the Filters icon. It s the three overlapping circles at the top of the screen. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 9 3 Select a filter. Each filter displays a small live preview to give you an idea of what a photo would look like. When you tap a filter, you ll return to the camera screen where you ll see it in action. If you don t like the filter, tap the Filters icon again to try another. Image titled Use iOS Photo Filters Step 10 4 Tap the shutter button to take the photo. This is the large round icon at the bottom of the screen. Your photo will be taken with the selected filter applied. You can also tap the volume up button on the side of the phone to snap the photo. [2] To remove the filter from the photo, tap the preview at the bottom left corner of the Camera app, tap the Edit icon (three horizontal lines with circle), then tap Revert . Advertisement
